about_the_game:
This DLC includes two powerful mages with “ice and fire” elements respectively: snow queen EVA & fire elf FEU. They also bring you a great deal of rare resources:

- Mercenary “EVA”, start with BLOOD MOON
- Mercenary FEU, start with 5 STAR
- 1000 Mana Crystal
- 2000 Soul
- 2000 Dark Iron
- 100 Hero Medal

“EVA” is a water mage good at throwing snow storm upon enemy and releasing destructive AOE skills:

- Blizzard: summon a light storm to cast 323% basic attack damage to enemy in its range
- Ice Cones: Shooting 4 icicles to attack and knock back nearby enemies
- Frozen Wind: Freeze nearby enemies for 5 sec, dealing water damage for 501% attack
- Snow Strom: Channel for 5 sec to call a snow storm that hits enemies in the area with 10 strikes, each dealing water damage for 336% attack; Extra 20%
water damage dealt to frozen enemies

“Feu” is a powerful mage dedicated in manipulating fire:

- Hell Flame: Cast 5 flames to strike random enemies, each inflicting damage for 114% attack and make them burnt for 5 sec
- Pyroblast: Fire a large fireball to the target after a long casting time, inflicting 908% attack damage and make the target burnt for 5 sec
- Flame Strom: Cast a fire ball that bounces 12 times among enemies, dealing fire damage for 167% attack per hit and make them burnt for 5 sec
- Blazing Roller: Cast a huge fireball that keeps rolling, dealing fire damage for 709% attack on all enemies on the way and stunning them for 4 sec, and
make them burnt for 5 sec

- Mercenary “EVA”, start with BLOOD MOON

- Ice Cones: Shooting 4 icicles to attack and knock back nearby enemies

make them burnt for 5 sec

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Mojave 10
  • Processor: Intel Core-i3 or faster processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS Mojave 10
  • Processor: Intel Core-i5 or faster processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
